actionConfiguration.body:
INSERT INTO public.sterilization_runs
(planned_item_id, planned_recipe_id, planned_unit_size, planned_count, operator, start_time, process_type)
VALUES (
  {{ SterilizerIn.sql.num(selPlannedItem.selectedOptionValue) }},
  {{ SterilizerIn.sql.num(selPlannedRecipe.selectedOptionValue) }},
  {{ SterilizerIn.sql.num(inpPlannedUnitSize.text) }},
  {{ SterilizerIn.sql.num(inpPlannedCount.text) }},
  {{ SterilizerIn.sql.str(inpOperatorIn.text) }},
  {{ SterilizerIn.sql.ts(dpStartTime.selectedDate) }}::timestamp,
  {{ SterilizerIn.sql.str(selProcessType.selectedOptionValue) }}
)
RETURNING nocopk, steri_run_id;

INSERT INTO public.sterilization_runs
(planned_item_id, planned_recipe_id, planned_unit_size, planned_count, operator, start_time, process_type)

  {{ SterilizerIn.sql.num(selPlannedRecipe.selectedOptionValue) }},
  {{ SterilizerIn.sql.num(inpPlannedUnitSize.text) }},
  {{ SterilizerIn.sql.num(inpPlannedCount.text) }},

  {{ SterilizerIn.sql.ts(dpStartTime.selectedDate) }}::timestamp,
  {{ SterilizerIn.sql.str(selProcessType.selectedOptionValue) }}
)
RETURNING nocopk, steri_run_id;

SELECT
  nocopk,
  item_id,
  name,
  category,
  default_unit_size
FROM
  public.items
WHERE
  category = 'casing'
  OR category = 'substrate'
  OR category = 'grain'
  OR category = 'agar_flask'
  OR category = 'lc_flask'
ORDER BY
  name;

SELECT
  nocopk,
  item_id,
  name,
  category,
  default_unit_size
FROM
  public.items
WHERE
  category = 'casing'
  OR category = 'substrate'
  OR category = 'grain'
  OR category = 'agar_flask'
  OR category = 'lc_flask'
ORDER BY
  name;

actionConfiguration.body:
WITH run_base AS (
  SELECT sr.*
  FROM public.sterilization_runs sr
  WHERE sr.nocopk = {{ SterilizerOut.sql.num(tblOpenRuns.selectedRow.nocopk) }}
  FOR UPDATE
),
run AS (
  SELECT
    rb.*,
    i.name AS item_name,
    i.category AS item_category
  FROM run_base rb
  LEFT JOIN public.items i ON i.nocopk = rb.planned_item_id
),
upd AS (
  UPDATE public.sterilization_runs sr
  SET
    end_time = CASE
      WHEN {{ dpEndTime.selectedDate ? "true" : "false" }} = 'true'
      THEN {{ SterilizerOut.sql.ts(dpEndTime.selectedDate) }}::timestamp
      ELSE now()
    END,
    good_count = {{ SterilizerOut.sql.num(inpGoodCount.text) }},
    destroyed_count = {{ SterilizerOut.sql.num(inpDestroyedCount.text) }},
    operator = {{ SterilizerOut.sql.str(inpOperatorOut.text) }}
  WHERE sr.nocopk = (SELECT nocopk FROM run_base)
  RETURNING sr.nocopk, sr.end_time, sr.process_type, sr.planned_unit_size, sr.planned_item_id
),
ins AS (
  INSERT INTO public.lots
    (item_name_mat, item_category_mat, process_type_mat,
     qty, unit_size, status,
     steri_run_id, operator,
     created_at, sterilized_at, use_by)
  SELECT
    run.item_name,
    run.item_category,
    run.process_type,
    1,
    run.planned_unit_size,
    CASE WHEN run.process_type = 'pasteurize' THEN 'Pasteurized' ELSE 'Sterilized' END,
    run.nocopk,
    {{ SterilizerOut.sql.str(inpOperatorOut.text) }},
    now(),
    (SELECT end_time FROM upd),
    CASE
      WHEN run.item_category IN ('grain','substrate','casing')
      THEN (SELECT end_time FROM upd) + INTERVAL '90 days'
      ELSE NULL
    END
  FROM run
  JOIN generate_series(
    1,
    COALESCE((SELECT good_count FROM upd), 0)
  ) gs(n) ON true
  WHERE NOT EXISTS (
  	SELECT 1 FROM public.lots l WHERE l.steri_run_id = run.nocopk
	)
	RETURNING nocopk
)
SELECT
  (SELECT end_time FROM upd) AS end_time,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ins) AS lots_created;

WITH run_base AS (
  SELECT sr.*
  FROM public.sterilization_runs sr
  WHERE sr.nocopk = {{ SterilizerOut.sql.num(tblOpenRuns.selectedRow.nocopk) }}
  FOR UPDATE
),
run AS (
  SELECT
    rb.*,
    i.name AS item_name,
    i.category AS item_category
  FROM run_base rb
  LEFT JOIN public.items i ON i.nocopk = rb.planned_item_id
),
upd AS (
  UPDATE public.sterilization_runs sr
  SET
    end_time = CASE
      WHEN {{ dpEndTime.selectedDate ? "true" : "false" }} = 'true'
      THEN {{ SterilizerOut.sql.ts(dpEndTime.selectedDate) }}::timestamp
      ELSE now()
    END,
    good_count = {{ SterilizerOut.sql.num(inpGoodCount.text) }},
    destroyed_count = {{ SterilizerOut.sql.num(inpDestroyedCount.text) }},
    operator = {{ SterilizerOut.sql.str(inpOperatorOut.text) }}
  WHERE sr.nocopk = (SELECT nocopk FROM run_base)
  RETURNING sr.nocopk, sr.end_time, sr.process_type, sr.planned_unit_size, sr.planned_item_id
),
ins AS (
  INSERT INTO public.lots
    (item_name_mat, item_category_mat, process_type_mat,
     qty, unit_size, status,
     steri_run_id, operator,
     created_at, sterilized_at, use_by)
  SELECT
    run.item_name,
    run.item_category,
    run.process_type,
    1,
    run.planned_unit_size,
    CASE WHEN run.process_type = 'pasteurize' THEN 'Pasteurized' ELSE 'Sterilized' END,
    run.nocopk,
    {{ SterilizerOut.sql.str(inpOperatorOut.text) }},
    now(),
    (SELECT end_time FROM upd),
    CASE
      WHEN run.item_category IN ('grain','substrate','casing')
      THEN (SELECT end_time FROM upd) + INTERVAL '90 days'
      ELSE NULL
    END
  FROM run
  JOIN generate_series(
    1,
    COALESCE((SELECT good_count FROM upd), 0)
  ) gs(n) ON true
  WHERE NOT EXISTS (
  	SELECT 1 FROM public.lots l WHERE l.steri_run_id = run.nocopk
	)
	RETURNING nocopk
)
SELECT
  (SELECT end_time FROM upd) AS end_time,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ins) AS lots_created;

SELECT
  sr.nocopk,
  sr.steri_run_id,
  sr.process_type,
  sr.start_time,
  sr.operator,
  sr.planned_unit_size,
  sr.planned_count,
  i.name AS planned_item_name,
  i.category AS planned_item_category,
  r.name AS planned_recipe_name
FROM public.sterilization_runs sr
LEFT JOIN public.items i ON i.nocopk = sr.planned_item_id
LEFT JOIN public.recipes r ON r.nocopk = sr.planned_recipe_id
WHERE sr.end_time IS NULL
ORDER BY sr.start_time DESC NULLS LAST, sr.nocopk DESC;

SELECT
  sr.nocopk,
  sr.steri_run_id,
  sr.process_type,
  sr.start_time,
  sr.operator,
  sr.planned_unit_size,
  sr.planned_count,
  i.name AS planned_item_name,
  i.category AS planned_item_category,
  r.name AS planned_recipe_name
FROM public.sterilization_runs sr
LEFT JOIN public.items i ON i.nocopk = sr.planned_item_id
LEFT JOIN public.recipes r ON r.nocopk = sr.planned_recipe_id
WHERE sr.end_time IS NULL
ORDER BY sr.start_time DESC NULLS LAST, sr.nocopk DESC;
